comment: This is the example file of config.json. Rename it to config.json and change to correct info first. When no param '?config=', using the 'default'. If '?config=group1', using the group 1.
comment2: the group default has all required params, and the group group1 has all valid params.
comment3: coinType can be xmr, eth, etc, zec; priceUnit can be btc, usd, cny, eur, rur.
comment4: the unit of aveRange is hours, typeof is 'integer'. the unit of updateInterval is minutes, typeof is 'float'.
